title: The Light through Ancient Trees
description: It’s been years since Lei Xing listened to the old romantic stories and dreamed of someday being in one of them. It’s been years since she entertained fancies about falling in love with a handsome prince and riding off with him into the sunset. She’s grown now, and grown-ups don’t hold on to such fanciful dreams. She has resolved to marry Shan and settle down with him as a responsible member of the clan.But Lei Xing’s sensible plan falls apart when one night she is traded away by her clan to become the property of Her Imperial Majesty, the empress of Xinan.Suddenly, Lei Xing is thrown into the life of the empress and her imperial court. Suddenly, she is mixed up in a plot to annihilate the clans. Suddenly, she is falling in love with the crown prince and her world has become every bit as dramatic as they are in the old legends and tales.And suddenly, she is forced to remember that as glorious as they sometimes are, not all of the old stories have happy endings.Stirring and unforgettable, Mereda Hart Farynyk’s The Light through Ancient Trees is a timeless tale of honor, courage, and learning how to love.
author: Mereda Hart Farynyk
